name: Browsers
description: A computer program with a graphical user interface for displaying and navigating between web pages.

name: HTML
description: HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is the code that is used to structure a web page and its content. For example, content could be structured within a set of paragraphs, a list of bulleted points, or using images and data tables.

name: CSS
description: CSS is the language for describing the presentation of Web pages, including colors, layout, and fonts.
